summary: Open archives in vim as a tree or flat list, w/ nesting support.
name: Archive
description:
Archive is a vim plugin which allows you to browse archive files (zip, jar, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2, etc) in vim as a tree (supporting nested archives) or as a flat list.

Note that you must currently have java 1.5 or greater installed as a prerequisite.

http://github.com/ervandew/archive
install_details:
Requires that java and javac be on your path.

Unzip the archive.zip file into your vimfiles location of choice after which you can then start viewing archive files in vim.

versions.release_notes: New and improved archive viewer broken out from eclim.
